description:
Monarque is a world famous Pofflé Master who was the chief juror at a Pofflé Contest that Serena participated in near Shoyo City.
She explained that Pofflés are sweets which are filled with the wishes for humans and Pokémon to get along well. She told the crowd and participants that excellent Pofflés may deepen the bond between Pokémon and people even further.
name: Monarque
